content: the reversible toys are double-faced toys designed to help work out emotions with young children it has a face that expresses joy on one side and one that shows sadness on the other side and it s a way for your little one to express his or her emotions this reversible mood toy bundle contains 3 different crochet patterns - reversible octopus - reversible cat -reversible ghost each contains the written pattern photos and video tutorial on how to make your toy crochet level easy - you need to be able to read a crochet pattern and know the basic stitches format pdf file pattern written row by row in us terms with side notes and photo tutorial and link to the step by step video language english only video tutorials yes sizes including the legs - octopus 18m in diameter 9cm tall - cat 17m in diameter 9cm tall - ghost 13m in diameter 12cm tall material needed make your toy using any yarn you like i have used aran worsted yarn #4 you will need less than a skein of yarn in any color hook 5mm
